config.title: Configuraci√≥n
config.info_text: This bridge enables direct communication with VRChat avatars via OSC (Open Sound Control). Enable the bridge to automatically send TikTok events to VRChat.
config.verbose_mode: Verbose mode (show all OSC packets live)

chat_commands.title: Chat Commands (GCCE Integration)
chat_commands.description: Allow viewers to trigger VRChat actions via chat commands
chat_commands.info_text: When enabled, viewers can control VRChat actions directly through chat commands. All commands are processed through the Global Chat Command Engine (GCCE).

parameter_tester.title: VRChat Parameter Tester
parameter_tester.description: Click a button to trigger the corresponding VRChat parameter:

custom_actions.title: Custom OSC Actions
custom_actions.subtitle: Custom OSC Messages
custom_actions.description: Send custom OSC messages to VRChat or other OSC-compatible applications. Messages will be sent to the configured target address.
custom_actions.reset_help: If set, the value will be reset to 0 after the specified time

gift_mappings.title: üéÅ Gift Catalogue Mappings
gift_mappings.info_text: Link TikTok gifts to VRChat OSC actions. When a viewer sends a specific gift, the mapped action will be triggered automatically.
gift_mappings.select_gift_or_manual: -- Select a gift from catalogue or enter manually below --
gift_mappings.catalogue_helper_text: Select a gift from the catalogue to auto-fill ID and name, or manually enter custom values below
gift_mappings.no_gifts_in_catalogue: (No gifts in catalogue - update catalogue from main dashboard)
gift_mappings.no_mappings: No gift mappings configured yet. Add one below.

avatar_management.title: üë§ Avatar Management
avatar_management.info_text: Manage your VRChat avatars. Avatar IDs can be found in VRChat logs or using tools like VRCLens.
avatar_management.no_avatars: No avatars configured yet. Add one below.

avatar_switch.title: Avatar Switching via Chat Commands
avatar_switch.info_text: Allow viewers to switch your VRChat avatar via the /avatar <name> command. Configure cooldowns to prevent spam.
avatar_switch.cooldown_per_user: Per User (each user has own cooldown)
avatar_switch.cooldown_help: Minimum time between avatar switches (0 = no cooldown)

command_management.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Command Management
command_management.info_text: Enable or disable individual commands, change permissions, and add custom commands. Changes will be registered with GCCE automatically.

custom_command.title: Add Custom Command
custom_command.osc_value_help: Value to send (number, true, false, or text)
custom_command.duration_help: Auto-reset to 0 after duration (0 = no reset)
